A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was great until the last 10 minutes. Then\, the worst thing that could happen to this nine movie story arc happened and rendered the last movie unneeded. I am at a loss for words and can only say that I have no interest in Rey. I am interested in the story of the Skywalker family. We'll have to see if the last movie can be one that ends the story giving the Skywalkers the attention they deserve.
